description: Change GIF alt text from simply being 'GIF' to containing the gif tags / filename

name: DisableCallIdle

description: Force the owner crown next to usernames even if the server is large.

name: SearchFix
description: Fixes the annoying "We dropped the magnifying glass!" error.

name: SekaiStickers
description: Sekai Stickers built in discord originally from github.com/TheOriginalAyaka

name: ScreenRecorder
description: epic screen recorder lol

name: ServerSearch
description: Navigate your servers better with a quick search button

name: ShowBadgesInChat
description: Shows the message author's badges beside their name in chat.

name: Signature
description: Automated fingerprint/end text

name: SidebarChat
description: Open a another channel or a DM as a sidebar

name: StatsfmPresence
description: Statsfm presence to track your music

name: StatusPresets
description: Allows you to remember your statuses and set them later

name: SoundBoardLogger
description: Logs all soundboards that are played in a voice chat and allows you to download them

name: TalkInReverse
description: Reverses the message content before sending it.

name: StickerBlocker
description: Allows you to block stickers from being displayed.

name: SteamStatusSync
description: Sync your status to Steam!

name: TextToSpeech
description: Reads out chat messages with openai tts

name: TeX
description: Typesets math in messages, written as `$x$` or `$$x$$`.

name: ThemeLibrary
description: A library of themes for Vencord.

name: Timezones
description: Shows the local time of users in profiles and message headers

name: UnitConverter
description: Converts metric units to Imperal units and vice versa

name: Translate+
description: Vencord's translate plugin but with support for artistic languages!

name: UnreadCountBadge
description: Shows unread message count badges on channels in the channel list

name: UserPFP
description: Allows you to use an animated avatar without Nitro

name: VcNarratorCustom
description: Announces when users join, leave, or move voice channels via narrator. TikTok TTS version; speechSynthesis is pretty boring. Ported from https://github.com/Loukious/Vencord

name: VideoSpeed
description: Allows you to change the speed of videos

name: ViewRawVariant
description: Copy/View raw content of any message, channel, or guild, but show in the right click menu.

name: VoiceChatUtilities
description: This plugin allows you to perform multiple actions on an entire channel (move, mute, disconnect, etc.) (originally by dutake)

name: VoiceChannelLog
description: Logs who joins and leaves voice channels

name: WebpackTarball
description: Converts Discord's webpack sources into a tarball.

name: WhitelistedEmojis
description: Adds the ability to disable all message emojis except for a whitelisted set.

name: WigglyText
description: Adds a new markdown formatting that makes text wiggly.

name: WhosWatching
description: Hover over the screenshare icon to view what users are watching your stream

name: Woof
description: Adds a chatbar button to woof in chat

name: YoutubeDescription
description: Adds descriptions to youtube video embeds

name: DecodeBase64
description: Decode base64 content of any message and copy the decoded content.
